resources.string: Calibrate your device by moving it in figure 8 pattern. If at any time you believe compass is not accurate try re-calibrating your device. Metal objects such as those from a watch or zipper pull or pocket knife, and magnetic sources like those in covers or portable speakers or other electronic devices can influence compass accuracy. To use this app hold your device flat like a real compass.
Magnetic sensor error. Reset your device! If reset does not work, your device doesn\'t have magnetic sensor and won\'t work with this app.\n\n
